description: Abraham with long beard, wearing long robe, at center, holding a knife in his PR hand, with youth Isaac wearing a loincloth, leaning against him, seated on a rock altar; angel with flowing drapery directly behind Abraham, with PR arm up and PL hand on Abraham's shoulder; ram caught in brambles at left; landscape in background; four lines of text at bottom
provenance: (Rodman Gallery, New York, sold to Hillstrom, 1946, for $10); Rev. Richard Lewis Hillstrom, Edina, MInn. (until 2012; given to MIA)
title: Abraham Sacrificing Isaac
